name: bounded_treewidth
chinese_name: 浅谈一类有界树宽问题
author: 吴畅
complexity: O(2^w w^2 n) for maximum independent set; O(n) for Bodlaender's tree decomposition algorithm when w is bounded, where w is the tree width and n is the number of vertices.
summary: The paper discusses the concept of tree width and its applications in solving classical graph problems efficiently on graphs with bounded tree width. It introduces tree decomposition, properties of k-trees and partial k-trees, and demonstrates how dynamic programming can be applied on tree decompositions—especially perfect or smooth ones—to solve problems like maximum independent set and shortest path in linear or near-linear time when tree width is bounded by a constant.
